relevantArticles.articleAbstractText: 镜像使用官网提供的镜像 https://developer.nvidia.com/embedded/learn/get-started-jetson-nano-devkit#write 这个镜像里已经自带了python3.6版本 先安装一些常用的包 sudo apt install python3-scipy -y sudo apt install python3-pandas -y sudo apt install python3-sklearn -y sudo apt install python3-seaborn -y sudo apt install libhdf5-serial-dev hdf5-tools libhdf5-dev zlib1g-dev zip libjpeg8-dev liblapack-dev libblas-dev gfortran sudo pip3 install -U numpy==1.16.1 future==0.18.2 mock==3.0.5 h5py==2.10.0 keras_preprocessing==1.1.1 keras_appl....
